dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2974824B] Unauthorized Use of LF, LLC's Intellectual Property
dmca.body:
Please note that the website www.homedepotsucks.org does not reside within our network as of 2:43:43 p.m. (GMT-6) on February 9, 2007. Legal Response Team The Planet -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2007 7:19 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2974824B] Unauthorized Use of LF, LLC's Intellectual Property ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Unauthorized Use of LF, LLC's Intellectual Property Added by system at Wednesday, Feb 7 2007 12:46 pm X-MailFrom: lfllc@comcast.net X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Feb 7 12:46:20 2007 Received: (qmail 8658 invoked by alias); 7 Feb 2007 18:46:19 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 8655 invoked from network); 7 Feb 2007 18:46:19 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 7 Feb 2007 18:46:19 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 7 Feb 2007 12:46:17 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 07 Feb 2007 12:46:17 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from lfllc@comcast.net) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HEro9-0001B1-J9 for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 07 Feb 2007 12:46:17 -0600 Received: from mail5.imaphost.com ([38.100.41.81]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from lfllc@comcast.net) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HEro2-0001ms-8R for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 07 Feb 2007 12:46:10 -0600 Received: from plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com [10.20.1.21]) by plmail5.prod.cyveillance.com (Postfix) with ESMTP id 7CA3C354195 for ; Wed, 7 Feb 2007 13:46:08 -0500 (EST) Received: from plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (localhost.localdomain [127.0.0.1]) by plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com (8.12.11/8.12.11) with ESMTP id l17Ik83i021271 for ; Wed, 7 Feb 2007 13:46:08 -0500 Date: Wed, 7 Feb 2007 13:46:08 -0500 (EST) From: lfllc@comcast.net To: abuse@theplanet.com Message-ID: <18099687.1411170873968435.JavaMail.cicusr@plcicap1.prod.cyveillance.com > Subject: Unauthorized Use of LF, LLC's Intellectual Property MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_Part_141_20736266.1170873968433" Disposition-Notification-To: lfllc@comcast.net X-OriginalArrivalTime: 07 Feb 2007 18:46:17.0825 (UTC) FILETIME=[407E8510:01C74AE8] (multipart/mixed) MIME element (text/html)
2/7/2007
 
Abuse

 
Re:  Unauthorized Use of LF, LLC's Intellectual Property on http://www.homedepotsucks.org/
 
Dear Abuse:
 
I am contacting you on behalf of LF, LLC ("LF").   LF is the owner of a family of trademarks, service marks, and associated domain names, including, but not limited to, LOWE'S, LOWE'S (Stylized), LOWE'S HOME IMPROVEMENT WAREHOUSE, IMPROVING HOME IMPROVEMENT, and the GABLE MANSARD DESIGN (collectively, the "Lowe's Marks").  I manage LF's Internet trademark compliance program.
 
We have recently been made aware of your usage of the Lowe's Marks in the metatags or other hidden text on the website located at http://www.homedepotsucks.org/.  Your usage of the Lowe's Marks in the metatags or other hidden text on this website is not authorized by LF; is likely to cause confusion, or to cause mistake, or to deceive consumers as to your affiliation, connection, or! association with LF or its licensee, Lowe's Companies, Inc.,; diverts Internet traffic away from the website operated by LF's licensee, Lowe's Companies, Inc., at www.lowes.com; and is in violation of federal and state laws.
 
The purpose of this e-mail is to bring this matter to your attention and to solicit your prompt assurance that you will discontinue use of the Lowe's Marks in the metatags or other hidden text on http://www.homedepotsucks.org/ or in any other unauthorized manner. 
 
Please address this issue immediately.  Should you have any questions, please contact me at the email address provided below.
 
Sincerely,
 
Rebecca E. Green
Trademark Manager
LF, LLC
lfllc@comcast.net 
  MIME element (text/plain)
